ygData.subject: Re: Clothing
ygData.messageBody:
Oh sorry, In Freeport.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Teri [mailto:greenidminx@...]

> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Clothing
>
>
> From: "Teri" <greenidminx@...>
>
> Right below the wizard guild in which city?
>
> Thanks!
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Rick & Margi Ulrich <ulrich1@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 11:28 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Clothing
>
>
> > From: "Rick & Margi Ulrich" <ulrich1@...>
> >

> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Teri [mailto:greenidminx@...]
> > > Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 7:03 PM
> > > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com

> > >

> > >

> > >
> > > Ximena
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Raphael Lowe <sevendegrees@...>
> > > To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 9:08 PM
> > > Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Clothing
> > >
> > >
> > > > From: "Raphael Lowe" <sevendegrees@...>
> > > >
> > > > Aye, I agree. I heard there was a list of robes out there somewhere
> > > > that tells us what colors and types there are. I once
> directed a poor
> > > > lost Erudite to get a green robe...he traveled all the way across
> > > > country just because he liked the color green.
> > > >
> > > > I'm hunting for the glowing purple robes I've seen some
> Wizards with.
> > > > Another wiz once told me he got his from a GM after he died. :(
> > > >
> > > > --LimDul
> > > > High Elf Wiz 11th
> > > > Veeshan
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > >From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>

> > > > >How about clothing? What other kind of clothing a wizard can have?
> > > > I tired of red and puple robe.
> > > > >
